code: import{SET_POLLS,SET_CURRENT_POLL}from'../actionsTypes';export var polls=function polls(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case SET_POLLS:return action.polls;default:return state;}};export var currentPoll=function currentPoll(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case SET_CURRENT_POLL:return action.poll;default:return state;}};
